title: Pilsen 2 BR + Study Unit Available Now!
posting_body: ['2nd Floor apartment in a three-flat building is available!', ' Located near 21st St. and Ashland Ave.', '2 BR, one with carpeting.', ' Hardwood floors throughout the remainder of apartment.', 'Study/Den provides additional living space.', 'Close to highways and public transportation (#9, #60, Pink Line)', 'Central Air/Heat.', 'Utilities not included; Landlord pays water bill.', 'Free on-site laundry.', 'Rent:  $1525/month', 'Seeking a one year lease.', ' Move-in fee of $350 and security deposit is required dependant on credit score.', "Renter's insurance also required.", 'Dogs ok with additional pet fee of $300.00', 'Credit check required (Payable directly to service).', ' Background check required once application has been conditionally  approved.', ' References will be checked.', 'Contact us to schedule appointments.']
